items.name: Plant
items.description: A plant to enhance your interior, providing freshness and tranquility to the atmosphere.

items.name: Stylized Flower
items.description: A designer flower (possibly artificial) to adorn your interior.

items.name: Unusual Bedside Table
items.description: A table that looks quite strange but is suitable for placement next to the bed.

items.name: Tea Table and Three Chairs
items.description: A set of three chairs and a designer table for the living room.

items.image: deps/images/goods/set of tea table and two chairs.jpg
items.name: Tea Table and Two Chairs
items.description: A set consisting of a table and two chairs in a minimalist style.

items.name: Office Chair
items.description: Product description praising its greatness, but it's just a chair, what else to say...

items.name: Corner Sofa for the Living Room
items.description: Corner sofa that transforms into a double bed, perfect for the living room and hosting guests!

items.name: Ordinary Sofa
items.description: A sofa, just an ordinary one, nothing remarkable to describe.

items.name: Double Bed
items.description: A double bed with a headboard, very orthopedic in nature.

items.name: Bedside Table
items.description: Bedside table with two drawers (flower not included in the set).

items.name: Kitchen Table with Sink
items.description: Dining kitchen table with a built-in sink and chairs.

items.name: Kitchen Table with Built-in Stove and Sink
items.description: Kitchen table with a built-in stove and sink. Plenty of shelves and overall beautiful.
